description:
A team of researchers from Australia's Swinburne University of Technology has unveiled first electric bus to be completely designed, engineered and manufactured in Australia.斯威本科技大学一队研究人员揭开了澳大利亚首辆完全经设计、建造和生产的电车的面纱。

The bus can carry 50 passengers 125 miles (200 kilometers) on a single charge, and could be up to 80% cheaper to maintain than the country's current fleet of diesel-powered buses.这辆公共汽车一次充电可以载50名乘客行125英里（200公里）路，养护费用要比澳大利亚现行柴油驱动的公交便宜两成。

Unveiled at the 2015 Maintenance Conference and Bus Expo in Melbourne, the electric bus was developed by an inter-institutional team comprised of experts from academia and the automotive industry.这辆电车在2015年墨尔本公交博览和养护会议上公之于众，由一支院际团队开发，该团队由学术专家和汽车工业方面的专家组成。

While Malaysian officials have already inked an AUD $170 million contract with the bus' developers, Australian officials have yet to follow suit.马拉西亚官方已经和公交开发商签署了1.7亿澳元的合同，澳大利亚政府官员也要紧随其后加入这一行列。

"I'd really like to see the Australian government invest in this technology. For the sake of the environment, as well as the future of manufacturing in Australia," remarked Professor Ajay Kapoor, Pro Vice-Chancellor of International Research Engagement at Swimdburne.“我很愿意看到澳大利亚政府为这项技术投资，为了环境，也为了澳大利亚制造业的将来，”斯威本科技大学代理国际研究的副校长阿加·卡普尔教授如是说。
